name: ImportFile
description: Task to import a file into PowerBI
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: filepath
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: A file path which is relative to root of repo if empty

inputs.name: orgName
inputs.label: PowerBI organisation name
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is your org name and is used in the API url

inputs.name: datasetDisplayName
inputs.label: dataset Display Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: When using a PBIX or Excel file, setting this parameter will override the default name of the dataset.

inputs.name: nameConflict
inputs.label: Name Conflict Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: If datasetDisplayName is provided, determines what to do if a Dataset with the same name exists. Otherwise, determines what to do if the Dataset is already imported.

inputs.name: PreferClientRouting
inputs.label: Prefer Client Routing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use this parameter to avoid the request redirecting between clusters and to avoid timeout errors.
